thread.title: Allot Communications to Host Second Quarter 2015 Earnings Results Conference Call on Tuesday, August 4, 2015
thread.title_full: Allot Communications to Host Second Quarter 2015 Earnings Results Conference Call on Tuesday, August 4, 2015

title: Allot Communications to Host Second Quarter 2015 Earnings Results Conference Call on Tuesday, August 4, 2015
text:
Allot Communications to Host Second Quarter 2015 Earnings Results Conference Call on Tuesday, August 4, 2015 -- Call to be held at 8:30 AM ET -- Allot Communications Ltd. 7 hours ago ÓÅ±   15,   ALLT) will host a conference call to discuss its second quarter 2015 earnings results on Tuesday, August 4 th , 201 5 , at 8:30AM ET/3:30PM Israel time. The quarterly financial results will be published prior to the conference call. 
To access the conference call, please dial one of the following numbers: 
US: + 1 212 4440896 , UK: +44(0) 203 3645721 , Israel: +972 3 7 630147 , participant code 1553650 . 
A recording of the conference call will be available from 12:00AM ET on August 5, 2015 for 30 days. To access the recording, please dial: US: + 1 347 3669565 ; UK: + 44 (0) 203 4270598 , access code: 1553650 . 
A live webcast of the conference call can be accessed on the Allot Communications website at http://www.allot.com . The webcast will also be archived on the website following the conference call.
